summary: A comprehensive suite of unit tests for Qiskit Pulse, covering schedule blocks, builders, calibration entries, channel types, continuous waveforms, experiment configurations, instruction mapping, pulse instructions, measurement macros, parameter management, expression parsing, waveform library, reference handling, samplers, schedule manipulation, and transformation utilities.
business_intent: Validate the correctness, robustness, and compliance of Qiskit Pulse components to prevent regressions and ensure reliable quantum control functionality.
